items.text: full just outside off stump, and carefully defended away to cover
items.shortText: Southee to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: glorious! Best shot from a No. 9 batsman this year. Full outside off, and he leans into a beautiful cover drive that pierces three infielders on the off side
items.postText: Looks like Sabbir needs some medical treatment. Remember him getting hit on the helmet against Lockie Ferguson? Sabbir is feeling the effects now.
items.shortText: Southee to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball on off, and he drags a pull from outside the stumps. Mistimed to midwicket
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: full just outside off stump, and defended towards cover
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: full outside off, and he looks to drive. Ball takes an under-edge and flies away to the third-man boundary. Sabbir motors along
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball on off, and he covers his off stump before defending off the back foot
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: nearly a yorker on off stump, but he digs this away to deep cover for a single
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and he prods forward to defend. Ball hits the bat's inside half and rolls away towards the non-striker
items.shortText: Boult to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: length ball, outside off stump, and he drags a pull over the infield and into the midwicket boundary
items.shortText: Southee to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length, just outside off, and tapped away to cover for a quick single
items.shortText: Southee to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, extra bounce takes it way over the batsman's head. Latham does well to intercept
items.postText: Rahul : "Irrespective of this performance by Southee, Matt Henry should open the bowling along with Trent Boult at the the world cup "
items.shortText: Southee to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: smacked! Length ball on off, and Mehidy places this pulled-shot beautifully behind square. Races to the boundary, despite two men manning the leg-side boundary
items.shortText: Southee to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

items.text: full toss on leg stump, but Mehidy can't connect. Through to Latham
items.shortText: Southee to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 wide

items.text: back of a length on off, and he swivels to pull. Top-edged over Latham's head and another boundary for Bangladesh
items.shortText: Southee to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

items.text: yorker at off stump, but Mehidy does well to dig this away. Back to the bowler
items.shortText: Southee to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: back of a length on off, and he pulls this to deep backward square on this occasion. Protection there
items.postText: Zahid: "Two crucials points if Bangladesh wants to improve in away conditions: 1. Improvement of home / domestic cricket quality ( pitches, umprining etc.) 2. Change of attitude / temperment of the players. "
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: very full on off stump, and all Mehidy can do is defend towards cover
items.postText: Terry Harpot: "Sabbir Rahman is motoring along, while Mehidy Hasan is no muck with the bat. He batted pretty well in the BPl, like a genuine striker of the ball. Everyone was surprised by his success with the willow in hand. The required rate is climbing up evermore, but if they can stick around and hit enough boundaries..... Kusal Perera did it, right?"
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: cuts him in half! Back of a length on off, and angling in. Mehidy tries to cut, but too close to his body. Through to Latham
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he plays a firm straight drive. Four if it beats mid-off, but Boult is no muck in the field. Slides to stop
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: back of a length on off, and Mehidy swiftly sways away from this 144kph delivery
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: overpitched on off, and he digs out a cover drive to the off side. Ball rolls away as they dribbles along to cover
items.postText: Shatu: "Now you can realise how Bangladesh could have win this match easily if they had wickets in hand. From this situation BD will get closer to the target, but winning this match is far cry. "
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he comes down the wicket to drive. Drilled to long off
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, and drives inside-out to long off for a single
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and his expansive cover drive gets an inside edge onto his body
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: full on off, and he comes inside the line of the ball to drive to long-on
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run
